website_summaries.verdict: Some bread knives only perform one task well, but this model can handle all sorts of food prep jobs with ease. The entry-level price makes it easy to own several at a time.
pros: Suitable for left or right-handed users
One piece construction, with no screws or adhesives
cons: Stainless steel handle is heavy in the hand, making it hard to grip
Blade may dull faster than expected

customer_reviews.title: Not made of Valyrian Steel
customer_reviews.text: "Useless for killing white walkers, and is also a crappy knife that can barely cut through a baguette." - Jon Snow Buy the Tojiro Bread Slicer 235mm F-737 instead. It does dull (and unlike Jon, is not worth being resurrected), but at least it was gloriously sharp for the months it lived. This knife arrived about as sharp as a bowl of oatmeal. You're welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Irene T

customer_reviews.title: My wife complained so I bought this knife.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife over a year ago because she complained that we don't have a good knife to cut bread. I, of course, thought she was being ridiculous and that our other knives did just fine. A year later I won't use any other knives to cut bread at home. It's a great knife and still very sharp. My wife was right (as usual).
customer_reviews.author: SHEFF

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this knife. I bought it for my bread maker bread. Very pleased. It cuts through easily and I don't have to push down too hard on the bread which can just squash your new loaf! Sellers even checked in to make sure I was happy with it via email. You don't get that great customer service that often these days and I really appreciate it. 5 stars and a thumbs up on this knife. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you want to use this knife to cut breads with a hard crust.
customer_reviews.text: This bread knife looks nice and sleek and might be decent enough to cut soft breads and tomatoes. However, as a real bread knife, it's useless. It arrived sharp but the design fails to cut through real bread crusts - that makes trying to cut such a crusty bread with this knife extremely dangerous since it just slides off without leaving a mark on the crust. Given the low price, I didn't expect the same performance as a high quality bread knife but I have a cheap tomato knife that does a better job cutting my crusty breads. Therefore, I do not recommend this product if you enjoy artisan style or German bread, which usually have a nice hard crust.
customer_reviews.author: Ronja

customer_reviews.title: It's not stainless steel - rust spots on mine - buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: This knife is not stainless steel. Mine has rust spots less than a month after purchasing it. The alloy is so soft that simply drying the blade left streaks on it that don't come out. Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Old serrated knife finally bit the dust, so I bought this one and one other. The other didn't work worth beans (it looks somewhat similar, but as we know in life, looks can often be deceiving. For some reason this one cuts through sourdough bread very easily, almost effortlessly. It is really a nice knife. Handle is nicely designed, but it feels like inexpensive plastic (but that does not detract from it fitting in hand nicely). Anyway I am very happy with this knife, and it is actually fairly inexpensive, unusual for a good quality knife.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: No more squished bread!  Woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I let my household go so long without a good bread knife after our last one broke. I am always so weary of knives because the cheap ones break so easily and it is not in our budget to spend $400. I figured it was better to have another cheap one than none at all so I ordered this. Pleasantly surprised! It feels weighty which is nice and doesn't feel like it is going to snap under pressure. My husband asked me to look into more knives from this brand and I will do so next time a knife needs replacing.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyP

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knife
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to get a backup to a bread knife we already loved. Wow, was quite surprised to find we like it even better than our old one. This seems like a great value, and is sharing the go-to status with another new bread knife (long story on why we bought 2). I'd expected this to be just the backup, but it has definitely become the favorite (even over the other new knife), though admittedly not by a lot. Both are really good knives, and often enough a 2nd one comes in handy! The other one is more of a "ginzue" style, and as such I think it does tomatoes a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Woodbridge Dave

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: I finally got tired of struggling with regular knives to cut bread, especially crusty bread. I was perennially unsuccessful in finding a decently priced knife at the usual places, and ended up ordering this. I've been extremely pleased with it so far. It is lightweight, but sharp and decisive. It cuts crusty bread with little effort and no slippage. It also does not shred more delicate bread and pastry products. I also occasionally use it to slice tomatoes. I've had it for about five months and it has shown no signs of wear at all.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp, easy to clean, comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent serrated knife! I can confirm what others have mentioned.... handle with care, this knife is amazingly sharp! It has a comfortable feel to it, and cuts bread easily, including breads with add-ins such as raisins, or peppers, or onions, etc. And it fits quite well into a typical wooden knife block. For those who may be interested, this knife cuts lettuce (and other vegetables) very cleanly, and despite the popular myth, it absolutely does *not* add to any browning of the lettuce. I would recommend this knife to anybody, as it is a very high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of the knife handle. All one piece of metal and the form of the handle fits my big hands perfectly with proper reference points for control. Its a bread knife but i got it for tomatoes. Works well but still too big for what i want. But its a perfect bread knife and ill put it in my knife block. Now im going to look into other knives from this company. I love the design. It will outlive me.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceThruMusic

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Homemade Bread
customer_reviews.text: This bread knife has good balance, a nice heavy weight, & comfortable handle. The entire knife is constructed out of a single piece of stainless steel, making it sleek & easy to clean. The bread knife is also extremely sharp! This is an important feature for any knife, especially a bread knife. I only wish it was an inch or two longer, but absolutely no regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Keeping your ten fingers in hand.......and your money in your wallet.....
customer_reviews.text: This multi-purpose knife advertised it could slice pineapples. I wanted a serrated to clean pineapples that dulls my regular knives. What a joke. The knife, fresh out the shipping box, mangled my pineapples so badly that I couldn’t use them for my fruit trays . I think I would have been better off using a butter knife. The knife looks elegant but as for using it for slicing or cutting fruit, its dangerous. I sliced a tomato and I had to push down hard the tomato got smashed. One has to use brute strength to slice which can lead to accidents. Even slicing bread was a joke. Do not buy this knife.
customer_reviews.author: pmduro

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after a single use
customer_reviews.text: I like this knife but it rusted after going through the dishwasher once after its very first use. I am very disappointed with this knife. I will purchase a better one and get a refund for this one.
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and thin
customer_reviews.text: The shape of this bread slicing knife is NOT flat but more thin "V" shapes which helps when cutting homemade breads or slicing ripe tomatoes. The sliced pieces naturally lean over and the cutting action continues straight down the item being cut. Extremely sharp. Haven't tried it on meat items yet but assume it will perform equally as well. I'll be looking to purchase more similar products from USA made ORBLUE in the future. One con: it does not come with a protective sheath for storing outside a kitchen block.
customer_reviews.author: Columbus

customer_reviews.title: Knife is not straight but has a bend to it
customer_reviews.text: Knife arrived bent and not straight. So its pointless to use for slicing bread due to the bend of this knife. Would return it but packaging make it difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bacciagalupe

customer_reviews.title: BEST bread knife EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife! I only gave it 4 stars for “versatility “ because it is, after all, a bread knife and so by its nature is limited to bread, tomatoes, etc...but wow, WHAT a bread knife! Super sharp, all one piece so there’s no handle to come loose or have to be seasoned, very comfortable and well-balanced. I have small hands but the handle is quite comfortable and the knife cuts through the crunchiest crust AND the softest tomato. I’d like to have a full set of knives by Orblue, but I didn’t see that offered on their amazon site.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley M.

customer_reviews.title: A nice knife
customer_reviews.text: I don't use bread knives that much (this replaced a 25-year old one that I got in a knife set from a discount store) but in the few times that I've used it during the month or so that I've had it, it has worked well beyond my expectations. Of course, I'm not sure how much that's due to the particular design and build of the Orblue, or just because it's a new knife. It works well and is easy to clean. It's also great for slicing tomatoes. You do have to make sure to dry it completely to prevent water spots; there is absolutely no way I'd consider putting it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Guffin

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is not stainless despite being labeled stainless steel right on the knife. The knife is OK for cutting bread, but that's a really low bar. It's deceptive practice. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jamestown 112

customer_reviews.title: Husband-approved
customer_reviews.text: My husband grated over the cheap serrated knife I had inherited when I first struck out to live on my own, I never really had a use for it but men, especially men who pride themselves in their cooking abilities, apparently emphasize the need for good knives. He finally had it with the old one so I bought this as a replacement without doing too much research on it, just to placate him for the time being, and he's very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: MrsG

customer_reviews.title: The knife started to rust after a week.
customer_reviews.text: This knife is not stainless steel. I've had knives for 30 years that have never rusted. Do not buy unless you want to dry and oil it every single time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good Stainless Knife
customer_reviews.text: I ran this knife through the dishwasher after i bought it and it had rust on it. a knife with 0 use isn't coated well enough or a good enough stainless to prevent rusting in a dishwasher isnt worth $15. this is dollar store junk
customer_reviews.author: Budboyy2k

customer_reviews.title: Rusted....Stainless steel?
customer_reviews.text: This item is rusted and I've had it for a week. I would like to return but do not have a box.
customer_reviews.author: MandaPanda5

customer_reviews.title: Terrific knife for a new hobby
customer_reviews.text: We've been baking a lot of bread while in quarantine and the knife that we usually rely on just doesn't cut bread very well so it was time to invest in a new knife. This was a great investment - reasonably priced, very sharp, comfortable in the hand, a good length for all different sized loaves. Very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDad

customer_reviews.title: SHARP
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy is very sharp! A bread bakery just opened up across the street from us and upon bringing home a freshly baked loaf of sourdough we realized we didn't have a bread knife. This thing cut through a loaf of bread like I've never seen. For $13??? I am confused... but not questioning it.
customer_reviews.author: David Lair

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this knife. I have a lot of high end knives but this one is now my favorite. I'm Making bread pudding with stale sour dough. Most knives let you down performing this task. The Orblue did an outstanding job. Besides it's great cutting ability I really like the fact it can be put in the dishwasher. No worries about screws coming undone & handles falling off etc. Believe me, it will be put to task many times over the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good & SHARP
customer_reviews.text: Need this knife more than I realized. My wife's Hematologist prescribed a Gluten-Free Diet making this knife an essential as WE wandered forth into a new adventure: Gluten Free Breads and desserts. The knife is great allowing me to precisely divide the loaves into 3/8" slices. I would recommend it to a friend. I go further; If there's a need to slice baked goods, I would recommend it to non-friends as well.
customer_reviews.author: Old and Still Kicking

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought higher end bread knife
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I’m used to high end knives, but I did not feel an expensive bread knife was worth it for how little we use one. However, I’ll say this knife barely does the job. We bake sourdough bread at home so you need a quality knife. Perhaps this would work for soft loaves.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly456

customer_reviews.title: Buy it its worth it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the $15 its very sharp n cuts very well. Actually better than expected for a low price and im impressed with it and honestly its a sexy knife and seems well made would def get another
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Knife, super Sharp and ready to go from the start.
customer_reviews.text: Great knife, super sharp, this knife will cut through anything and everything. I'm in the process of moving so I've had just a little experience with this gem of a knife but I'm looking forward to showing it off to my friends and reatives once I'm settleted and baking my own bread. Thanks for such a great knife at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: GarySten

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The Orblue bread knife is one of the best purchases I've made from Amazon. This one piece serrated knife cuts the Artisan breads I make without even creating a lot of crumbs. If you cut thin cuts or thick cuts, they are perfect.. Any chef or baker will tell you how important it is to have really good cutlery. You can make the best bread in the world, but it is essential to have the best knife in order to enjoy the masterpiece you have created. Five stars + from a grateful consumer.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: I love this bread slicer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bread slicer. I bake a lot of bread. After trying two other bread knives, I had almost resigned myself to half torn, squished bread. This knife works wonderfully on hot from the machine bread and cooled bread. It cuts through cleanly, leaving no crumb, no jagged tears, and no crushed bread. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly sharp and durable
customer_reviews.text: This knife is incredibly sharp, and is still sharp 2 years after I bought it. I use it for leveling cakes and cutting bagels, and i am constantly impressed with how sharp and effective it is, and how easy it is to clean.
customer_reviews.author: zg

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sharp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service and even better bread knife! The knives were received in jig-time and delivered with perfect timing to gift 1 of the 2 to my daughter. I opened my knife, washed it, and then used it to cut a crusty bread I'd made that morning. It cuts easily and cleanly. I'm very pleased with it. Thank you for the excellent bread knives.
customer_reviews.author: Chucky9

customer_reviews.title: Smooth cutting and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was mildly surprised to see that the handle was brushed metal and not rubber covered. The photos did not make this clear. That having been said, the knife has a comfortable grip making it very easy to maneuver. So far, I have used it to cut pumpkin bread and I really didn't need to exert any force. It cut through under its own weight. The bread is notorious for crumbling, yet the slices came out very clean. I am impressed. I very highly recommend this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Reneau

customer_reviews.title: A Great Bread Kife
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it's supposed to do. It arrived shiny and VERY sharp right out of the package. It has work wonderfully cutting through my home baked breads with flattening or destroying them. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaisha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful knife
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful knife! Longer than expected but very attractive. I prefer knives and kitchenware to be all one solid piece and this one fits right in. Cuts through hard baguette bread like butter.
customer_reviews.author: ame1210

customer_reviews.title: The Easily Slicing Knife
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the knife as well as the maneuverability of the knife. It easily slices through sandwiches and that’s a good thing since I make a lot of them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and sharp and works well
customer_reviews.text: Works Well. I don't like that it does not come with some sort of plastic case to protect the knife. Charge a little bit more money if necessary. But don't ship a bread knife with no covering. It's ridiculous. As far as how it works. I have no complaints. It absolutely cuts well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Liked it at first  , but two months out is losing it’s edge
customer_reviews.text: I am dissatisfied this knife. It was great initially, but is already getting dull two months out. And there is no way to sharpen it effectively due to it’s serrated edge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: A very pretty knife. Ease of slicing many breads. Not 4 stars for me because it is very heavy in my hand. Not 5 stars because although it does the job on my crusty french bread it doesn’t lessen my hand’s effort. If you want to give it a try, don’t worry, their customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Sand

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This knife is absolutely FANTASTIC! I bought it to layer my cakes along with one of the Wilton layer tools incase the Wilton one didn't work as I expected. Well, needles to say the Wilton tool broke after 2 uses and I bought another (for some crazy reason) but I find myself using this knife 95% of the time instead. It is super sharp and cuts perfectly, almost too perfectly- I got a good little cut on my finger due to my own negligence. I've even used it to cut plastic dowels and cardboard and it's still as sharp as the day it arrived! I plan on buying a few more in the future just to have extra.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C.

customer_reviews.title: ... this bread knife 2 weeks ago and we're very pleased with it's sharpness
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bread knife 2 weeks ago and we're very pleased with it's sharpness. It cuts through bread, muffins, and cake effortlessly. I even use it on fresh tomatoes to slice thin pieces for sandwiches. It's all metal and is sturdy. The price is much cheaper cpmpared to other knives out on the market, but it will not disappoint you in performance. I would recommend this knife if you want to pay less but have a sharp knife for bread.
customer_reviews.author: John Lindh

customer_reviews.title: Great Bread Knife
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knife, easily slices through any type of bread, makes perfect slices thick or thin. But be careful, it is very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Bread Knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this bread knife! It is one of the best I’ve ever had! Love the stainless steel and it does the job in cutting the French bread for our Poboys!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Knife
customer_reviews.text: We all (the whole family) really like this bread knife. Cuts beautifully. It sits nicely in the hand as it is well weighted. The handle is nice and thick, but not too thick, which makes it more comfortable for my arthritic hands than our old, thinner handled bread knives. Does a marvelous job on our whole grain solid breads without having to add a lot of muscle power. Slides just as easily through baguette. Also excellent for tomatoes.
customer_reviews.author: C O

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful knife and super sharp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful knife and super sharp. Worked great on a very dense bread as well as a light crusty loaf... and in a pinch can use to slice tomatoes. The serrated edge is very sharp, as well as the tip (some bread knives I've owned have had blunted ends). I love that it is made from one piece of metal, so no worries about breaking the handle off while cutting.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: What a pleasure to use!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. It has been perfect for cutting through my home made crusty breads. I can cut very thin or thick easily. It's also easy for an amature like myself to use, weighted nicely, looks very expensive! The price was so much better then I saw in stores. Customer service has been outstanding in keeping in touch and making sure I am pleased. I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: PghNurse

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now - Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The knife cuts beautifully and the company has reached out to me a couple of times, to make sure I was satisfied. I made one suggestion, as they are interested in improvement of their product - maybe a sheath of some type to place it in(?). All in all, for the price I paid - well worth the investment and happy to have helped a small company VS always buying from the big dogs that really could care less!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Holman

customer_reviews.title: It's a bread knife
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bread knife, and this is a bread knife. The serration wasn't what I expected for a bread knife, but it cuts bread well enough, and the finish is easy to clean with a soft sponge and dish soap. I haven't had to scrub it very hard, since I only use it to cut bread.
customer_reviews.author: Beef Rocksteak

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bread knife I've ever had and I had to break down and buy one cuz I buy a Sourdough loaf of bread that I love and when I let them slice it on the store's machine it would tear big holes in it. This knife cuts through it like butter. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this knife wondering what kind of quality it would have at such a low price. I didn't want to spend too much as it was basically to cut bread and angel food cake (you HAVE to have a serrated knife to cut angel food cake or you will ruin the cake). If I didn't know how much I paid, I would have thought it was probably a $50 knife. I would definitely buy again. I will also look and see what kind of other knives this brand makes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well
customer_reviews.text: Recently had to replace my old serrated bread knife. First purchase, which cost twice as much, just shredded my bread and left piles of crumbs. This bread knife does what its supposed to and cuts easily and neatly without tearing up the bread. Also reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Aspirant1

customer_reviews.title: I have a small restaurant and they are perfect for the staff to use
customer_reviews.text: these knives are very sharp and very durable. Cuts through bread and meats without any problems. I have a small restaurant and they are perfect for the staff to use. The only drawback and its very small - when wearing gloves and doing meats the knife wants to slide out of your hand, there is no grip. Now i know its a bread knife - but i have tried the true meat knife and it breaks up the meat, but not this knife, goes straight down without shredding.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Colston

customer_reviews.title: Dull
customer_reviews.text: This product was dull out of the package. Pay attention to the reviews with one star. I bought a bread slicer from Amazon to use it with and it was so dull it would not slice straight in a guide. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: fcdgllc

customer_reviews.title: We love this knife
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after the handle on another bread knife broke. We love this knife. It is made out of solid stainless steel. Bread and handle are one piece. The handle is satin stainless, the rest is polished. We love it. It is very sharp. It cuts hard and soft breads equally easily. Haven't cut anything else with it like tomatoes, but we use other knives for that. Very happy with the purchase. It expect it to last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: kjvp

customer_reviews.title: Good but too short for breadmaker loaf
customer_reviews.text: It was a good knife, sharp and easy to handle. Unfortunately, I sent it back as it was not long enough for the loaf my breadmaker makes.
customer_reviews.author: Landab

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for an epic price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the culinary industry for 15plus years. I have a $300.00 Henckels knife set that sadly did not have a bread knife. I did not want to spend an extra $60.00 dollars on a henckels knife; so I thought I would give this knife a shot. It looked great and the cost was ridiculously cheap. I can tell you that I am astonished by how great this knife works! I proudly put it up against my Henckels knifes any day. The only thing cheap about this knife is the price. Get one now before this company realizes they are basically giving away a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, it's just a bread knife. But, a great knife!
customer_reviews.text: I really love a good crusty bread. However, they can be more than your average knife can chew. The ORBLUE Serrated Bread Knife solved that problem. It is very solid and just glides right through my artisan breads. I am completely satisfied with the quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: randy jeffreys

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised by the quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my old serrated bread knife because it was horrible. I was just looking for better than I had, nothing spectacular. I was genuinely surprised (in a good way) by what I got for the price I paid. I honestly didn’t know you could cut bread without being angry at your knife. You can make nice thin slices, and it’s easy. You won’t regret buying this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: A good bread knife to replace mine that broke after years of use. I like the all stainless design. My daughter often forgets and leaves my knives in the sink warping the wood handle. This puts an end to that concern. It stays nice and sharp and handles wonderfully even for a lefty.
customer_reviews.author: Skater's Mom

customer_reviews.title: My search for a perfect bread knife is finally over!
customer_reviews.text: I received my bread knife and it exceeds my expectations. I have been searching for the perfect knife to use on our homemade bread for a while now. I really like the way this knife feels: weight, balance, handle, and blade are wonderful. It is perfect! I only wish I would've known about it years ago. Thank you for creating the perfect bread knife!! It will not go in a drawer. I have it out with the rest of my often used knives.
customer_reviews.author: Meeko

customer_reviews.title: For the money this is a great knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cut my clear ice cubes for my whiskey. I needed something inexpensive that I can tap on the spine with a hammer after I score the block and I could not have asked for a better knife for this.
customer_reviews.author: toddinnv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bread Knife
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bread knife. Just the right size. We have another one, but the blade is just too long. This works great on baguettes, boules, and batards (longer, fatter and taller "baguettes"). Easy to clean. Liked it enough to buy a spare to bring when I bring bread I've baked to the office.
customer_reviews.author: pebble

customer_reviews.title: No bread squished while cutting
customer_reviews.text: Sliced beautifully with every homemade bread I’ve made. Cuts easily and no smooshing. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Massinok

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I am an experienced artisan bread and pastry baker- My 15 year old Japanese bread knife performs far better than this one- it does not slice so much as shreds and desroys. Today I tried to halve cake layers with it- utter catastrophe! ! Tomorrow I am going to try it in the garden- perhaps my cabbages will fare better than my baked goods.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Walunis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bread Knife!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bread knife. Researched a lot and wasn’t entirely sure this was the right one - was / is better than expected. Great handle and a year later is going strong!! Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hardie

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice bread knife. I like the one piece stainless steel design. So far I havent had to sharpen it.
customer_reviews.author: Sprocket

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: As a former bakery manager....this is a must have knife
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: After looking at stores locally I decided to try this on Amazon and it is exactly what I needed. This is a knife that can cut through crusty bread without tearing it or squashing it. And it is priced right. I noticed a couple of reviewers stated that it won't cut tomatoes and I agree . . . but it is not intended to be a tomato knife. It's just a really good bread knife.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbyz

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have a bread knife, you need this bread knife.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this a few hours ago. It's like the BMW of knives. Sliced through some days old homemade french bread like butter. Just recently got into making fresh bread with a bread machine. After trying to slice with a sorely inadequate knife I decided it was worth $13 to make my life easier. BEST purchase ever. Can't wait til next summer to see how it slices through fresh tomatoes! It's a work of functional art.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Kay Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: I am a sourdough bread baker. I find this knife cuts easily right through the crust without tearing the bread. It has a nice balanced feel, fits my hand well and is easy to control. The blade is nice and sharp. This is an excellent quality inexpensive knife.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kahl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is on track to be one of the very best knives I have ever owned. It cuts through bagels and bread with ease and without leaving a trail of crumbs! Highly recommended. Great product. Thanks Orblue!
customer_reviews.author: nytstone

customer_reviews.title: Best knife for homemade bread
customer_reviews.text: We make a lot of our own breads and was never able to cut them decently with other knives we had. This one was amazing. Clean cuts with even slices every time. The price was also awesome for how well it works. I am looking forward to many more baked breads this winter now that I can have more sandwich slices that are even.
customer_reviews.author: rainie

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself to an Orblue bread knife
customer_reviews.text: This nifty bread knife is a pleasure to use and the handle is just ergonomic enough I can hold onto it without any trouble. The only thing about using it in a bread slicer guide is that it isn't quite long enough and it's a wee bit too thick. That's okay, I sliced the old bagel by hand and it took care of the job quickly! I'm anxious to see what it'll do when I slice homemade bread with it - I think it'll whiz right through the loaf! Makes a really nice addition to anyone's kitchen - try it, you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made knife and super sharp. Cuts through hard crusted bread with ease. I recommend this knife
customer_reviews.author: Dannie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not going to replace my Henckels chef's knife, but for a bread knife it's great.
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression is that this knife is a great value. The blade tapers to a nice thickness along the spine making the knife stiff so that it doesn't flex, nor bend easily. Bending is what did in the ginsu knife this one replaced. In addition the solid metal construction means I don't have to worry about the handles cracking if I put it in the dishwasher. This is not going to replace my Henckels chef's knife, but for a bread knife it's great
customer_reviews.author: D. Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Slice through anything
customer_reviews.text: super sharp right out of box. Cuts through a 5 pound gummy bear easily. And those giant gummy bears are rugged.
customer_reviews.author: k.williams

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Purchased originally by my wife to trim cakes for decorating. I am now using it also to slice bagels. Through away my old bread knife.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kozlow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Use this product daily on my homemade bread. No problem with the size. Maneuvers wonderfully Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: karen dafopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for homemade bread!
customer_reviews.text: We baked homemade bread all the time and this knife has been absolutely perfect for it! It slices the bread thinly for sandwiches and following proper cleaning instructions, has not dulled or rusted at all for months now. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvaria Malice

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Still sharp- still works , more than a year later
customer_reviews.author: No Nmae

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but slices unevenly.
customer_reviews.text: The knife is beautiful and very sharp, but it is oddly difficult to use. It feels as though it is not well balanced. When I use it, it seems to "pull" to one side making it very difficult to slice evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Really a high quality bread knife. Good purchase. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great Bread knife
customer_reviews.text: Great bread knife really the perfect size I store mine on a magnet strip so it stays nice & sharp
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette L. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Far From My Favorite Knife
customer_reviews.text: I have found this knife so difficult to control that I have never been able to cut a straight slice from a loaf of homemade bread. I cannot recommend it, but I do recommend a ceramic bread knife - two or three times the price and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Staff

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, cuts bread without a lot of crumbs or squishing the bread down while slicing. I also love it for tomatoes. Slices them paper thin.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value and you can tell this knife will last. Ive used it for way harder tasks than cutting bread and it holds up great.
customer_reviews.author: DACo

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in perfect condition! It is weighted beautifully and has a very comfortable to grip handle. Oh and is it sharp! Cut through a whole cantaloupe with ease! Great great value for the price! I will definitely be checking out more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bread knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is great for bagels, bread, tomatoes - anything where a serrated knife comes in handy. It has a nice long blade for any size food.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Collins

customer_reviews.title: Finally-a knife that cuts great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for slicing my homemade bread! Nice long blade & easy to hold. I keep it in a special place so it only gets used for my yummy bread.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tucker

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. I made some bread just so i can use try it out. Wow it feels good in the hand not heavy nor flimsy but firm enough to have control its so very sharp glides through bread realy nice and i love the fact that its all one peice no wood handel. It cleans up beautifuly..
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp and attractive
customer_reviews.text: The knife is long, very sharp, attractive and easy to clean. Easily cuts bread without having to put pressure on it during slicing.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. The first time I used this knife was on a loaf of French bread. Cut through it perfectly. I fully recommend this
customer_reviews.author: William M. Fritzsche

customer_reviews.title: great bread knife
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this bread knife and was quite surprised at the quality for the price. It is very sharp, has good balance and has a comfortable feel. Would recommend this product as an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe G

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Would give 0 stars if possible. Butter knife cuts better then this. Returning as it is useless!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful knife does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleek look. It cuts even softer and warm bread just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Justlikeawoman

customer_reviews.title: Great bread knife
customer_reviews.text: Great bread slicing knife, which is what I bought it for. Easy to use & clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: this knife is better than anything I ever expected
customer_reviews.text: Weirdly, this knife is better than anything I ever expected. I was literally shopping for a "cheap" bread knife, and this was the best rated least expensive option... and it outshines anything else I've owned. The heft is perfect, the seamless construction flawless. If I hadn't underestimated it, I probably wouldn't be nursing a sliced palm. It's a darn good knife.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pleural

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: To think I almost bought an overpriced bread knife. This is one of the best. Im really happy with it. I only wish it had a case
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo leyva

product_meta.title: Orblue Serrated Bread Knife Ultra-Sharp Stainless Steel Professional Grade Bread Cutter - Cuts Thick Loaves Effortlessly - Ideal for Slicing Bread, Bagels, Cake (8-Inch Blade with 4.9-Inch Handle)
feature_bullets: ULTRA-SHARP, CUTS EFFORTLESSLY: The Orblue Serrated Bread Knife blade has an ultra-sharp serrated edge that grips and effortlessly slices the toughest loaves of bread, to provide a smooth, clean cut. The blade runs 8 inches long with a 4.9 inch handle. Included as an added safety measure on the knife’s sharp tip is a rubber safety guard.
HIGH QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL: Made with high quality stainless steel and only 2.2 mm and 0.1 mm thick, the quality is durable enough to withstand everyday use on the toughest breads.

SLEEK ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The knife was ergonomically designed with careful attention to detail, so you can slice comfortably and easily. The handle is made to perfectly fit any grip, making slicing harder loaves a breeze.

ONE PIECE DESIGN: The entire knife is one continuous piece of stainless steel. There is no plastic, wood parts, or screws that tend to move and wear out over time, so you can be confident that your knife is built to last for years.
NOT JUST FOR BREAD: This serrated knife is so sharp it easily grips and cuts through cake, crusty bread, bagels, pastries. Budget friendly, it's the perfect gift for all the bakers in your life!
